TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An anticancer drug that belongs to the family of drugs called angiogenesis inhibitors. Marimastat is a matrix metalloproteinase inhibitor.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento contra el cáncer que pertenece al tipo de los inhibidores de la angiogénesis. El marimastat es un inhibidor de la metaloproteasa de matriz.
